name: The King's Return
description:
A short platformer game made for portfolio.
----------------
Controls:
A/D - move
Space - jump
LMB/RMB - attack with sword/magic
----------------
Some buttons such as Save/Load/Settings don't work, since this is just a brief gameplay mechanics representation.
Also, since this is a browser game, "quit" button is not recommended to use, since it isn't working perfectly.
----------------
Enjoy the game!
